# simpleweather

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

simpleweather is an R package that simply retrieves weather data for a vector of dates.

```{r example}
library(simpleweather)
dates <- seq(Sys.Date() - 10, Sys.Date() + 5, by = 'day')
weather <- get_weather(dates)
tail(weather, 10)
```

Currently only works for Central Park, NY. Location argument in the works

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joemarlo/simpleweather")
```

Requires API keys for the [NOAA API](https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo-web/webservices/v2) and [OpenWeather API](https://openweathermap.org/api/one-call-api).
